snippet: Portugal's start to the World Cup couldn't have been much worse: a 4-0 loss to Germany, a lackluster performance from Cristiano Ronaldo, a key defender sent off and another probably out of the tournament....

headline.print_headline: Ronaldo's Portugal Sputters in World Cup Opener
headline.main: Ronaldo's Portugal Sputters in World Cup Opener

lead_paragraph: Portugal's start to the World Cup couldn't have been much worse: a 4-0 loss to Germany, a lackluster performance from Cristiano Ronaldo, a key defender sent off and another probably out of the tournament.
